House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04928
FULL TITLE : AN ACT STRENGTHENING UNION ORGANIZATION AND DISALLOWING CANCELLATION OF UNION REGISTRATION, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE PRESIDENTIAL DECREE NO. 442, AS AMENDED, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE LABOR CODE OF THE PHILIPPINES
SHORT TITLE : " Union Formation Act "
ABSTRACT : Provides that independent union or a local/chapter has only to give notice of its creation to the DOLE to acquire legal personality; Removes the twenty percent minimum membership requirement for creation of independent union and lowers to two, the ten unions or locals for federation or national unions.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : MENDOZA, RAYMUND DEMOCRITO C.
